title: Disturbed -2011- The Lost Children [320kbs] ~~Renovatio~~
description:
The Lost Children is a B-sides compilation album by American metal band Disturbed. It was released on November 8, 2011. The album was announced in August 2011 by David Draiman via Twitter, where he answered several questions regarding the album. The Lost Children is Disturbed's longest album to date.
